column1: Happy Thanksgiving to all Americans!  Please join me in giving thanks to all of the men and women who serve so we can enjoy the blessing of freedom and liberty.  Thank you as well to the doctors nurses and other first responders on the front lines fighting against COVID-19. https://t.co/jLwUf5kHGt

News about my Phase 3 COVID-19 vaccine trial.  I have confidence in American science American pharmaceutical innovation the @US_FDA & @realDonaldTrump's   #OperationWarpSpeed to bring Safe & Effective Vaccines to hardworking Americans in record time!   https://t.co/OYSlfB3CiV

2020 may wind up being one of the most significant years for pharmaceutical advancement in history.  #OperationWarpSpeed   Strong early results for 2 Covid vaccines have positive implications for health -- https://t.co/wKrtqwZKUM via @WSJ

In other news on Friday I had the second injection of an experimental COVID-19 vaccine as part of the Phase-3 study for one of the promising candidates. I have great faith in American science the @FDA and #OperationWarpSpeed to produce and distribute Safe & Effective vaccines!

More great news about the American economy growing at the fastest rate in history.  While there is still work to do @realDonaldTrump is bringing our economy back to where it was before COVID https://t.co/yTg7TOzMyK

Today I had the privilege of addressing the Rotary Club of Bryan to congratulate them on their 100th anniversary and talk about my time in Congress and the progress we have made in the fight against COVID-19. https://t.co/3xNs2v9037
Pelosi ignoring COVID-19 https://t.co/EYLEE6Ahd1
I will be on @KBTXNews shortly to discuss the Presidents coronavirus diagnosis and other issues important to Central Texans.
Lifting up @POTUS @realDonaldTrump @FLOTUS and all who have COVID-19 in our prayers for a full and speedy recovery.
Praying for a speedy recovery to @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS and to all Americans who are currently fighting the Coronavirus.
I just completed the COVID-19 prevention clinical studies volunteer registry questionnaire. It was easy! Join me in helping science move forward. https://t.co/8n0GJzMFSz

Today I joined @Surgeon_General Jerome Adams as we toured the CIADM facility at @TAMU.  This facility has the ability to produce one hundred million doses of a potential COVID-19 vaccine. https://t.co/Z83GULCLFW
Hmmm 40% of the COVID-19 deaths in the U.S. are the result of 5 Democrat governors forcing sick patients into their nursing homes. https://t.co/7SSdtYmgvZ
Today the @RepublicanStudy put out more than 100 proposals to help American workers as we continue to recover from the COVID pandemic. https://t.co/aJg8o2H1Wl

It was my pleasure today to join the @WacoChamber for their annual State of the Nation to talk about what we are doing in Congress to help businesses and families with the COVID-19 pandemic and other challenges. https://t.co/JwVHPpbGb9

Today the federal government announced that @TAMU and @FujifilmDiosyn will produce $265 million worth of #COVID19 vaccines as part of #OperationWarpSpeed.  This announcement puts A&M at the forefront of the fight against Coronavirus! https://t.co/3MTsOs66ac
Between this and their lies about the Coronavirus 2020 has demonstrated beyond a shadow of a doubt that China should not be trusted. https://t.co/hmIf209ZgE
We now know the Imperial College COVID-19 model was so highly flawed that it never should have been relied upon for policy decisions. https://t.co/FQHmqZjIYB via @kdd0211 @DailySignal
CIA 'believes China pressured WHO to downplay the risk of coronavirus' https://t.co/E35QHBfriS via @MailOnline
Accurate news regarding #coronavirus and #covid19 which show the depth breadth and speed of the Federal Response lead by @POTUS @realDonaldTrump and @VP.

Today I led a letter along with @GReschenthaler and 19 of my colleagues to @realDonaldTrump supporting his decision to withhold funding from the WHO until an investigation can be conducted.  The Chinese must answer for their role in the spread of Coronavirus. https://t.co/sYBQ1MPuIG

Today I voted to increase funding for the Paycheck Protection Program an important lifeline for small businesses around the country hardest hit by the Coronavirus.  It is shameful that House Democrats made these businesses wait two weeks for this funding.

Today House Democrats will vote to waste taxpayer dollars by creating a select committee on Coronavirus all to help @SpeakerPelosi save face after she picked $13 ice cream over helping to save American small businesses. https://t.co/MWe8qroUNH
Planned Parenthood continues to claim that killing babies is "essential".  MANCINI And MCCLUSKY: Coronavirus Has Exposed Planned Parenthood’s Self-Interest https://t.co/d2tgrqQTN8 via @dailycaller

Today @HHSGov awarded funding to Brazos Valley Community Action Agency and Heart of Texas Community Health Center to combat the Coronavirus.  Thank you to all the doctors nurses and support staff at these health centers for your bravery and dedication.
This is a common-sense ruling that will prioritize essential medical care for Texans fighting COVID-19. https://t.co/Vpr4OxFfih

It is important for Texans to stay informed about the latest efforts to fight the Coronavirus. For the most up-to-date information please visit my website and sign up for my newsletter. https://t.co/FtsVIHQhV9

Today I sent a letter to @KenPaxtonTX supporting his recommendation to suspend all non-essential medical procedures.  Our health care system should be 100 percent focused on stopping Coronavirus. https://t.co/Lbn6YgJnau
The Chinese government has deliberately underreported the total number of coronavirus cases and deaths in the country the U.S. intelligence community told the White House. https://t.co/1iz5ws2rmf
Today I joined with dozens of my House and Senate colleagues calling on Secretary Perdue to provide relief to our nation's cattle farmers who are affected by Coronavirus. https://t.co/4OhyiX2PTA
Today is #NationalDoctorsDay.  I salute all of the men and women who are selflessly treating those affected by #COVID19 as well as other emergencies.  You have the gratitude of the entire nation.

Flying into today’s environment—I flew up to DC yesterday to vote on the Coronavirus Phase 3 bill and my flights were less than 20% full. These pictures show what it was like at DCA while catching my flights back to TX this evening. #BTHO #Coronavirus! https://t.co/NhtguKQTWg

This morning I spoke on the floor in favor of the third Coronavirus relief package.  It provides needed resources for Texas and also contains my provision to move the drug supply chain away from Communist China and back to the United States. https://t.co/bjmapwsXQ5

Pregnant & worried about the effects of #coronavirus?  Here's the good news:  Pregnant women don't appear to be at higher risk.  No maternal deaths among women studied.  Mothers infected with #COVID19 deliver live babies #choosehope  Learn more: https://t.co/fwjltIMflQ https://t.co/mxRhmEhJBH

FACT: Elective abortion treats no disease process.  30000 physicians sign @aaplog statement calling for the suspension of elective abortion during the #COVID2019 pandemic.  #choosehope  Read here: https://t.co/msHxLyzVb0 https://t.co/eMMiSi06Es
Last night I joined @KBTXNews to discuss the Coronavirus stimulus package and what it means for Texans.   https://t.co/ucFMruK5BQ

I know many folks have questions about Coronavirus and what they need to know.  That is why I have created this resource for everyone to find answers to their questions.  I hope this can be helpful: https://t.co/oeBXs4G1NJ

11/11 Pelosi Schumer & Dems wasted valuable weeks on a sham impeachment of @realDonaldTrump during the early stages of #ChinaVirus.  #ENOUGH!  It is time for them to put #AmericaFirst instead of liberal donors like Bloomberg!

over politics and fight for bipartisan legislation that will directly help American workers and businesses.  Over the past few months Pelosi wasted WEEKS during the early onset of the #ChinaVirus with her SHAM IMPEACHMENT PROCESS

.@realDonaldTrump and the Coronavirus Task Force are working hard to keep America safe.  All Americans should follow their guidance and be smart about their activities to help slow the spread of Coronavirus. https://t.co/OZ6RtjodAd

This week was extraordinarily busy in the House.  In addition to last night's vote on combating Coronavirus we also voted on legislation about Iran and reauthorizing FISA.  For all the details please read my newsletter: https://t.co/RhCTO1V3or

I strongly support @POTUS declaration of a national emergency and his creation of strong partnerships with private industry and states to develop an unprecedentedly strong approach to defeat the #Coronavirus.  Working together we will beat this!
China's disinformation campaign is exactly why the global response to Coronavirus was delayed and why we are in this position in the first place. https://t.co/WeIoNa4wJ3
As the first two presumptive cases of Covid-19 have been diagnosed in Austin I have full confidence in @AusPublicHealth and will do everything I can to help.
